content.content: We will keep a public record of all the disputes here. There will be *Disputes *Novel Situations *Unclear Policy The current policy is on the Gitcoin Grants Disputes Wiki. Now that the FDD workstream has funding to build out more clearly defined policy and processes, we hope to build a world class dispute, appeal, and sanctioning policy. DISPUTES UNCLEAR POLICY It came up in GR10, that an artist can promote themselves or a project idea, but not link directly to a sale on open sea. Is this grant eligible for the Ethereum Ecosystem?   💰 Zouzoukwa: Promoting African cultures on the blockchain | Grants    💰 Zouzoukwa: Promoting African cultures on the blockchain | Grants Zouzoukwa is a project at the intersection of art, design, culture and technology I started in 2018. Every day of the year, I created and posted on Instagram a new emoji representing a cultural element of Africa, and I released an app to make the...      NOVEL SITUATIONS
